name: Photo Vault - Hide Private Photos & Videos
description: Photo Vault, the best photo management app, security hide private photos&videos. With Photo Vault, you can protect your privacy, secure your photos, and save phone space.   Hide private photos and videos with Photo Vault  Large cloud photo storage & cloud backup, release the mobile phone space.  keep safe, simple and practical photo vault hide pictures!  -----------MAIN FUNCTION----------- Album Lock  After the photo is uploaded to Photo Vault, you can lock the album by setting personal password to improve the security of the album. Cloud Backup  Encrypted Private Cloud securely syncs your photos, albums and videos across all your devices. Retrieve Files  Retrieves photos youve mistakenly deleted  -----------SPECIAL FEATURE -----------  Import and hide pictures, hide video from video&photo gallery.  Custom Change album names.  Video player to watch videos inside photo vault  Worried about forgetting your password? Set a security email in Vault so you can retrieve it.  Contact US:wedota2@gmail.com
